albums.title: album title
albums.releaseDate: album release date, as date object
albums.cover: album cover, image as base64 string
albums.label: album label

performances.date: performance date and time, as date object

products.number: product number (not sure if we need this)
products.name: product name

songs.title: song title
songs.writer: song composer (not sure if we need both composer and lyricist)
songs.recording: song recording, audio as base64 string
